metadata.title: CVE-2014-3877 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in Frams' Fast File EXchange (F*EX, akafex) before fex-20140530 allows remote attackers to conduct cross-sitescripting (XSS) attacks via the addto parameter to fup.

criterions.comment: fex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
